definition: to continue to discuss a poem over a long period
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
